data.question: What is the empirical formula of ZrEBDC?
What is the BET surface area of ZrEBDC?
What changes occur in the BET surface area after ozonolysis of ZrEBDC?
data.answer: The BET surface area decreases to 685 m²/g after ozonolysis.

data.question: Is the crystal structure of ZrEBDC retained after ozonolysis?
data.answer: Yes, the crystal structure of ZrEBDC is retained after ozonolysis.

data.question: What is the conversion percentage of olefinic groups into 1,2,4-trioxolane rings after 30 minutes of ozonolysis?
What is the BET surface area of ozo-ZrBDC partially functionalized with CHO groups?
What is the BET surface area of ZrBDC-COOH?
Does the BET surface area increase or decrease after converting ozo-ZrBDC into ZrBDC-COOH?
data.answer: The BET surface area decreases after converting ozo-ZrBDC into ZrBDC-COOH.

data.question: Is the conversion of the trioxolane ring into aldehyde groups 100% efficient?
data.answer: No, the conversion of the trioxolane ring into aldehyde groups is 40% efficient.

data.question: What is the crystal system of ZrEBDC?
What is the space group of ZrBDC-COOH?
Does the ozonolysis reaction time affect the degree of functionalization of ZrEBDC?
data.answer: Yes, the ozonolysis reaction time affects the degree of functionalization of ZrEBDC.

data.question: What is the final R index for ZrEBDC?
What is the correlation coefficient for the BET liner fit of ZrEBDC?
Is the BET surface area of ozo-ZrBDC higher than that of ZrBDC-COOH?
data.answer: Yes, the BET surface area of ozo-ZrBDC is higher than that of ZrBDC-COOH.

data.question: What is the empirical formula of ZrBDC-COOH?
What is the yield percentage of ZrEBDC synthesis?
Is the BET surface area of ZrEBDC greater than 1000 m²/g?
data.answer: Yes, the BET surface area of ZrEBDC is greater than 1000 m²/g.

data.question: What is the yield of single crystals of ZrEBDC suitable for SCXRD?
Does the crystal system of ZrEBDC change after ozonolysis?
data.answer: No, the crystal system of ZrEBDC does not change after ozonolysis.
